data.command:
START=$(echo ${start} | cut -c1-19,30-30); STOP=$(echo ${stop} | cut -c1-19,30-30); curl -s "https://csa.esac.esa.int/csa/aio/streaming-action?DATASET_ID=${id}&START_DATE=$START&END_DATE=$STOP&NON_BROWSER&CSACOOKIE=391F56682C0D5F7D1F095D6A7A38466327015020370B4060650602652A1C522F27095D7D391F56682C0D5F412C05462F2E0C46" | perl -pe 's/$
/
/g' | perl -pe 's/,
/,/g'| perl -pe 's/\$//g' | grep -E '^\s*[0-9]{4}'
